title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\LocationPolicy
name: LocationPolicy
description:
Configuration for location policy among multiple possible locations (e.g. preferences for zone selection among zones in a single region).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.LocationPolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.locations
params.description: Location configurations mapped by location name. Currently only zone names are supported and must be represented as valid internal URLs, such as zones/us-central1-a.

params.name: data.target_shape
params.description: Strategy for distributing VMs across zones in a region. Check the TargetShape enum for the list of possible values.

methods.description:
